Fiz uma compra com prazo estipulado de 3 dias para entrega no site, com dois itens. O pagamento foi realizado no pix. Os itens não foram entregues, quando entrei em contato, uma atendente, muito da mal educada, me disse que o prazo havia aumentado para mais 3 dias e que não podia cancelar. Após insistir, ela disse que iria cancelar e que só após esse produto voltar a eles ia começar a contar de 3 a 5 dias para a devolução do dinheiro. O pix, entra em 30 minutos para o pagamento, o produto nunca chegou até a mim, vou ter que esperar sei lá quantos dias p ele retornar ao centro mais 3 a 5 dias para ser feito um pix????? Um absurdo. E para piorar, hoje, chega esse item, que tinha pedido para cancelar ontem. E muito irresponsabilidade com o consumidor.

My $500 package was delivered to the wrong address back in May, which was a university mail room. I tried to reach out to Amazon and explain that it was delivered to the wrong address, but they said that because someone signed for it, I must be lying. They told me to file a police report within 45 days, which I did, and to send it back to them once it was complete. The ONLY stipulation on this was to have the report filed by 45 days after delivery. I sent the report to Amazon immediately and have the filing date and emails to prove it - I reached back out today after not hearing anything back and the support person tells me that the package is too old and the carrier can't provide information... But YOU GUYS were the carrier! I pressed back a bit and asked for a supervisor to explain that I already filed the report and need to talk to someone who can help. Your SUPERVISOR then made up an entirely new rule that even if the report is filed within 45 days, Amazon can only offer a refund until 60 days... So Amazon basically determines that if the police can't open and close an investigation within 2 weeks, they don't have to refund a $500 package that they ignorantly delivered to the wrong place? Absolutely insane. I was treated like a liar or a scammer from the very first time I tried to get help with this and it leaves a really bad taste in my mouth.
